## Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem It Solves
What problem does this feature solve? What use case does it enable?

## Proposed Solution
How do you envision this feature working?

## Alternatives Considered
What alternative solutions or features have you considered?

## Additional Context
- Would you be willing to contribute a PR for this feature?
- Are there similar features in other projects we could reference?
- Any mockups, diagrams, or examples?

## Impact
Which parts of the codebase would this affect?
- [ ] Core adapter
- [ ] MCP server
- [ ] CLI
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Tests
